current_belt: What is your current rank in jiu jitsu?
training_years: How long have you been training jiu jitsu?
white_blue: How long did it take you to go from white belt to blue belt?
blue_purple: How long did it take you to go from blue belt to purple belt?
purple_brown: How long did it take you to go from purple belt to brown belt?
brown_black: How long did it take you to go from brown belt to black belt?
training_per_week: On average, how many times do you train per week?
both_gi_nogi: Do you train both gi and no-gi?
gi_or_no_gi: Do you prefer training gi or no-gi?
gym_self_defense: Does your academy focus on self-defense?
training_time: What is your preferred time to train?
travel: Do you train at gyms when you travel?
background_ma: Did you have a background in another martial art before you started jiu jitsu?
favourite_raw: What is your favorite part about training?
how_old_when_started: How old were you when you started jiu jitsu?
instrutor_encourages_competition: Does your instructor encourage students at your gym to compete?
competed: Have you competed in jiu jitsu before?
medals: If you have competed, have you won any of the following medals?
competition_organisation: If you have competed, what was the organization (e.g., IBJJF, NAGA, etc.)?
gym_curriculum: Does your gym have a formal curriculum?
currently_cross_train: Do you cross-train in other martial arts? If so, which one(s)?
mobility_exercises: Do you do mobility exercises to prepare your body for jiu jitsu (e.g., ginastica natural)?
yoga: Do you do yoga to prepare your body for jiu jitsu?
num_gis: How many gis do you own?
num_rashguards: How many rash guards do you own?
num_shorts: How many no-gi shorts do you own?
bjj_apparel: Do you buy jiu jitsu apparel (e.g., tee shirts, hats, etc.)?
money_for_gear: How much do you spend per year (on average) on gear and apparel?
membership: How much do you spend per month for membership dues?
time_watching_bjj: How much time do you spend per day (on average) reading or watching jiu jitsu-related material?
education: What is your education level? Please select the highest degree you've completed.
do_watch_sport_bjj: Do you watch sport jiu jitsu?
have_fav_athlete: Do you have a favorite jiu jitsu athlete or athletes?
choke: Is your favourite submission a choke?
brand_problem: Have you ever had a problem with a particular manufacturer or brand?  If so, which one(s) and what was the problem?
reasons_raw: Why did you start training jiu jitsu?
least_fav_raw: What is your least favorite part about training?
watch_raw: If you do watch sport jiu jitsu, what do you watch and where do you watch it?
favourite_athletes_raw: Who are your favorite athletes (if any)?
